 22236                   if (f == hlinfo->mouse_face_mouse_frame)
 22237                     {
 22238                       /* If we move outside the frame, then we're
 22239                          certainly no longer on any text in the frame.  */
 22240                       clear_mouse_face (hlinfo);
 22241                       hlinfo->mouse_face_mouse_frame = 0;
 22242                       x_flush_dirty_back_buffer_on (f);
 22243                     }
 22244 
 22245                   /* Generate a nil HELP_EVENT to cancel a help-echo.
 22246                      Do it only if there's something to cancel.
 22247                      Otherwise, the startup message is cleared when
 22248                      the mouse leaves the frame.  */
 22249                   if (any_help_event_p
 22250                       /* But never if `mouse-drag-and-drop-region' is
 22251                          in progress, since that results in the
 22252                          tooltip being dismissed when the mouse moves
 22253                          on top.  */
 22254                       && !((EQ (track_mouse, Qdrag_source)
 22255                             || EQ (track_mouse, Qdropping))
 22256                            && gui_mouse_grabbed (dpyinfo)))
 22257                     do_help = -1;
 22258 
 22259                   if (f && leave->event == FRAME_X_WINDOW (f))
 22260                     xi_compute_root_window_offset_enter (f, leave);
 22261                 }
 22262 #ifdef USE_GTK
 22263               /* See comment in EnterNotify above */
 22264               else if (dpyinfo->last_mouse_glyph_frame)
 22265                 x_note_mouse_movement (dpyinfo->last_mouse_glyph_frame, &ev,
 22266                                        source ? source->name : Qnil);
 22267 #endif
 22268               goto XI_OTHER;
 22269             }
 22270 
 22271           case XI_Motion:
 22272             {
 22273               struct xi_device_t *device, *source;
 22274 #ifdef HAVE_XINPUT2_1
 22275               XIValuatorState *states;
 22276               double *values;
 22277               bool found_valuator = false;
 22278               bool other_valuators_found = false;
 22279 #endif
 22280               /* A fake XMotionEvent for x_note_mouse_movement. */
 22281               XMotionEvent ev;
 22282               xm_top_level_leave_message lmsg;
 22283               xm_top_level_enter_message emsg;
 22284               xm_drag_motion_message dmsg;
 22285               unsigned int dnd_state;
 22286 
 22287               source = xi_device_from_id (dpyinfo, xev->sourceid);
 22288 
 22289 #ifdef HAVE_XINPUT2_1
 22290               states = &xev->valuators;
 22291               values = states->values;
 22292 #endif
 22293 
 22294               device = xi_device_from_id (dpyinfo, xev->deviceid);
 22295 
 22296               if (!device)
 22297                 goto XI_OTHER;
 22298 
 22299 #ifdef HAVE_XINPUT2_2
 22300               if (xev->flags & XIPointerEmulated)
 22301                 goto XI_OTHER;
 22302 #endif
 22303 
 22304 #ifdef HAVE_XINPUT2_1
 22305 #ifdef HAVE_XWIDGETS
 22306               struct xwidget_view *xv = xwidget_view_from_window (xev->event);
 22307               double xv_total_x = 0.0;
 22308               double xv_total_y = 0.0;
 22309 #endif
 22310               double total_x = 0.0;
 22311               double total_y = 0.0;
 22312 
 22313               int real_x, real_y;
 22314 
 22315               for (int i = 0; i < states->mask_len * 8; i++)
 22316                 {
 22317                   if (XIMaskIsSet (states->mask, i))
 22318                     {
 22319                       struct xi_scroll_valuator_t *val;
 22320                       double delta, scroll_unit;
 22321                       int scroll_height;
 22322                       Lisp_Object window;
 22323                       struct scroll_bar *bar;
 22324 
 22325                       bar = NULL;
 22326 
 22327                       /* See the comment on top of x_cache_xi_devices
 22328                          for more details on how scroll wheel movement
 22329                          is reported on XInput 2.  */
 22330                       delta = x_get_scroll_valuator_delta (dpyinfo, device,
 22331                                                            i, *values, &val);
 22332                       values++;
 22333 
 22334                       if (!val)
 22335                         {
 22336                           other_valuators_found = true;
 22337                           continue;
 22338                         }
 22339 
 22340                       if (delta != DBL_MAX)
 22341                         {
 22342                           if (!f)
 22343                             {
 22344                               f = x_any_window_to_frame (dpyinfo, xev->event);
 22345 
 22346                               if (!f)
 22347                                 {
 22348 #if defined USE_MOTIF || !defined USE_TOOLKIT_SCROLL_BARS
 22349                                   bar = x_window_to_scroll_bar (dpyinfo->display,
 22350                                                                 xev->event, 2);
 22351 
 22352                                   if (bar)
 22353                                     f = WINDOW_XFRAME (XWINDOW (bar->window));
 22354 
 22355                                   if (!f)
 22356 #endif
 22357                                     goto XI_OTHER;
 22358                                 }
 22359                             }
 22360 
 22361 #ifdef USE_GTK
 22362                           if (f && xg_event_is_for_scrollbar (f, event, true))
 22363                             *finish = X_EVENT_DROP;
 22364 #endif
 22365 
 22366                           if (FRAME_X_WINDOW (f) != xev->event)
 22367                             {
 22368                               if (!bar)
 22369                                 bar = x_window_to_scroll_bar (dpyinfo->display, xev->event, 2);
 22370 
 22371                               /* If this is a scroll bar, compute the
 22372                                  actual position directly to avoid an
 22373                                  extra roundtrip.  */
 22374 
 22375                               if (bar)
 22376                                 {
 22377                                   real_x = lrint (xev->event_x + bar->left);
 22378                                   real_y = lrint (xev->event_y + bar->top);
 22379                                 }
 22380                               else
 22381                                 x_translate_coordinates (f,
 22382                                                          lrint (xev->root_x),
 22383                                                          lrint (xev->root_y),
 22384                                                          &real_x, &real_y);
 22385                             }
 22386                           else
 22387                             {
 22388                               real_x = lrint (xev->event_x);
 22389                               real_y = lrint (xev->event_y);
 22390                             }
 22391 
 22392 #ifdef HAVE_XWIDGETS
 22393                           if (xv)
 22394                             {
 22395                               if (val->horizontal)
 22396                                 xv_total_x += delta;
 22397                               else
 22398                                 xv_total_y += delta;
 22399 
 22400                               found_valuator = true;
 22401                               continue;
 22402                             }
 22403 #endif
 22404 
 22405                           if (delta == 0.0)
 22406                             found_valuator = true;
 22407 
 22408                           if (signbit (delta) != signbit (val->emacs_value))
 22409                             val->emacs_value = 0;
 22410 
 22411                           val->emacs_value += delta;
 22412 
 22413                           if (mwheel_coalesce_scroll_events
 22414                               && (fabs (val->emacs_value) < 1)
 22415                               && (fabs (delta) > 0))
 22416                             continue;
 22417 
 22418                           window = window_from_coordinates (f, real_x, real_y, NULL,
 22419                                                             false, false);
 22420 
 22421                           if (WINDOWP (window))
 22422                             scroll_height = XWINDOW (window)->pixel_height;
 22423                           else
 22424                             /* EVENT_X and EVENT_Y can be outside the
 22425                                frame if F holds the input grab, so fall
 22426                                back to the height of the frame instead.  */
 22427                             scroll_height = FRAME_PIXEL_HEIGHT (f);
 22428 
 22429                           scroll_unit = pow (scroll_height, 2.0 / 3.0);
 22430 
 22431                           if (NUMBERP (Vx_scroll_event_delta_factor))
 22432                             scroll_unit *= XFLOATINT (Vx_scroll_event_delta_factor);
 22433 
 22434                           if (val->horizontal)
 22435                             total_x += val->emacs_value * scroll_unit;
 22436                           else
 22437                             total_y += val->emacs_value * scroll_unit;
 22438 
 22439                           found_valuator = true;
 22440                           val->emacs_value = 0;
 22441                         }
 22442                     }
 22443                 }
 22444 
 22445 #ifdef HAVE_XWIDGETS
 22446               if (xv)
 22447                 {
 22448                   unsigned int state;
 22449 
 22450                   state = xi_convert_event_state (xev);
 22451                   x_display_set_last_user_time (dpyinfo, xev->time,
 22452                                                 xev->send_event, true);
 22453 
 22454                   if (found_valuator)
 22455                     xwidget_scroll (xv, xev->event_x, xev->event_y,
 22456                                     -xv_total_x, -xv_total_y, state,
 22457                                     xev->time, (xv_total_x == 0.0
 22458                                                 && xv_total_y == 0.0));
 22459                   else
 22460                     xwidget_motion_notify (xv, xev->event_x, xev->event_y,
 22461                                            xev->root_x, xev->root_y, state,
 22462                                            xev->time);
 22463 
 22464                   goto XI_OTHER;
 22465                 }
 22466               else
 22467                 {
 22468 #endif
 22469                   if (found_valuator)
 22470                     {
 22471                       x_display_set_last_user_time (dpyinfo, xev->time,
 22472                                                     xev->send_event, true);
 22473 
 22474 
 22475 #if defined USE_GTK && !defined HAVE_GTK3
 22476                       /* Unlike on Motif, we can't select for XI
 22477                          events on the scroll bar window under GTK+ 2.
 22478                          So instead of that, just ignore XI wheel
 22479                          events which land on a scroll bar.
 22480 
 22481                          Here we assume anything which isn't the edit
 22482                          widget window is a scroll bar.  */
 22483 
 22484                       if (xev->child != None
 22485                           && xev->child != FRAME_X_WINDOW (f))
 22486                         goto XI_OTHER;
 22487 #endif
 22488 
 22489                       /* If this happened during a drag-and-drop
 22490                          operation, don't send an event.  We only have
 22491                          to set the user time.  */
 22492                       if (x_dnd_in_progress
 22493                           /* If another master device moved the
 22494                              pointer, we should put a wheel event on
 22495                              the keyboard buffer as usual.  It will be
 22496                              run once the drag-and-drop operation
 22497                              completes.  */
 22498                           && xev->deviceid == x_dnd_pointer_device
 22499                           && (command_loop_level + minibuf_level
 22500                               <= x_dnd_recursion_depth)
 22501                           && dpyinfo == FRAME_DISPLAY_INFO (x_dnd_frame))
 22502                         goto XI_OTHER;
 22503 
 22504                       if (fabs (total_x) > 0 || fabs (total_y) > 0)
 22505                         {
 22506                           inev.ie.kind = (fabs (total_y) >= fabs (total_x)
 22507                                           ? WHEEL_EVENT : HORIZ_WHEEL_EVENT);
 22508                           inev.ie.timestamp = xev->time;
 22509 
 22510                           XSETINT (inev.ie.x, lrint (real_x));
 22511                           XSETINT (inev.ie.y, lrint (real_y));
 22512                           XSETFRAME (inev.ie.frame_or_window, f);
 22513 
 22514                           inev.ie.modifiers = (signbit (fabs (total_y) >= fabs (total_x)
 22515                                                         ? total_y : total_x)
 22516                                                ? down_modifier : up_modifier);
 22517                           inev.ie.modifiers
 22518                             |= x_x_to_emacs_modifiers (dpyinfo,
 22519                                                        xev->mods.effective);
 22520                           inev.ie.arg = list3 (Qnil,
 22521                                                make_float (total_x),
 22522                                                make_float (total_y));
 22523                         }
 22524                       else
 22525                         {
 22526                           inev.ie.kind = TOUCH_END_EVENT;
 22527                           inev.ie.timestamp = xev->time;
 22528 
 22529                           XSETINT (inev.ie.x, lrint (real_x));
 22530                           XSETINT (inev.ie.y, lrint (real_y));
 22531                           XSETFRAME (inev.ie.frame_or_window, f);
 22532                         }
 22533 
 22534                       if (source && !NILP (source->name))
 22535                         inev.ie.device = source->name;
 22536 
 22537                       if (!other_valuators_found)
 22538                         goto XI_OTHER;
 22539                     }
 22540 #ifdef HAVE_XWIDGETS
 22541                 }
 22542 #endif
 22543 #endif /* HAVE_XINPUT2_1 */
 22544 
 22545               if (!xi_position_changed (device, xev))
 22546                 goto XI_OTHER;
 22547 
 22548               ev.x = lrint (xev->event_x);
 22549               ev.y = lrint (xev->event_y);
 22550               ev.window = xev->event;
 22551               ev.time = xev->time;
 22552               ev.send_event = xev->send_event;
 22553 
 22554 #ifdef USE_MOTIF
 22555               use_copy = true;
 22556 
 22557               copy.xmotion.type = MotionNotify;
 22558               copy.xmotion.serial = xev->serial;
 22559               copy.xmotion.send_event = xev->send_event;
 22560               copy.xmotion.display = dpyinfo->display;
 22561               copy.xmotion.window = xev->event;
 22562               copy.xmotion.root = xev->root;
 22563               copy.xmotion.subwindow = xev->child;
 22564               copy.xmotion.time = xev->time;
 22565               copy.xmotion.x = lrint (xev->event_x);
 22566               copy.xmotion.y = lrint (xev->event_y);
 22567               copy.xmotion.x_root = lrint (xev->root_x);
 22568               copy.xmotion.y_root = lrint (xev->root_y);
 22569               copy.xmotion.state = xi_convert_event_state (xev);
 22570 
 22571               copy.xmotion.is_hint = False;
 22572               copy.xmotion.same_screen = True;
 22573 #endif
 22574 
 22575               previous_help_echo_string = help_echo_string;
 22576               help_echo_string = Qnil;
 22577 
 22578               if (hlinfo->mouse_face_hidden)
 22579                 {
 22580                   hlinfo->mouse_face_hidden = false;
 22581                   clear_mouse_face (hlinfo);
 22582                 }
 22583 
 22584               f = mouse_or_wdesc_frame (dpyinfo, xev->event);
 22585 
 22586               if (f && xev->event == FRAME_X_WINDOW (f))
 22587                 /* See the comment above x_compute_root_window_offset
 22588                    for why this optimization is performed.  */
 22589                 xi_compute_root_window_offset (f, xev);
 22590 
 22591               if (x_dnd_in_progress
 22592                   /* Handle these events normally if the recursion
 22593                      level is higher than when the drag-and-drop
 22594                      operation was initiated.  This is so that mouse
 22595                      input works while we're in the debugger for, say,
 22596                      `x-dnd-movement-function`.  */
 22597                   && (command_loop_level + minibuf_level
 22598                       <= x_dnd_recursion_depth)
 22599                   && xev->deviceid == x_dnd_pointer_device
 22600                   && dpyinfo == FRAME_DISPLAY_INFO (x_dnd_frame))
 22601                 {
 22602                   Window target, toplevel;
 22603                   int target_proto, motif_style;
 22604                   XRectangle *r;
 22605                   bool was_frame;
 22606 
 22607                   /* Always clear mouse face.  */
 22608                   clear_mouse_face (hlinfo);
 22609                   hlinfo->mouse_face_hidden = true;
 22610 
 22611                   /* Sometimes the drag-and-drop operation starts with the
 22612                      pointer of a frame invisible due to input.  Since
 22613                      motion events are ignored during that, make the pointer
 22614                      visible manually.  */
 22615 
 22616                   if (f)
 22617                     {
 22618                       XTtoggle_invisible_pointer (f, false);
 22619 
 22620                       r = &dpyinfo->last_mouse_glyph;
 22621 
 22622                       /* Also remember the mouse glyph and set
 22623                          mouse_moved.  */
 22624                       if (f != dpyinfo->last_mouse_glyph_frame
 22625                           || lrint (xev->event_x) < r->x
 22626                           || lrint (xev->event_x) >= r->x + r->width
 22627                           || lrint (xev->event_y) < r->y
 22628                           || lrint (xev->event_y) >= r->y + r->height)
 22629                         {
 22630                           f->mouse_moved = true;
 22631                           f->last_mouse_device = (source ? source->name
 22632                                                   : Qnil);
 22633                           dpyinfo->last_mouse_scroll_bar = NULL;
 22634 
 22635                           remember_mouse_glyph (f, lrint (xev->event_x),
 22636                                                 lrint (xev->event_y), r);
 22637                           dpyinfo->last_mouse_glyph_frame = f;
 22638                         }
 22639                     }
 22640 
 22641                   if (xev->root == dpyinfo->root_window)
 22642                     target = x_dnd_get_target_window (dpyinfo,
 22643                                                       lrint (xev->root_x),
 22644                                                       lrint (xev->root_y),
 22645                                                       &target_proto,
 22646                                                       &motif_style,
 22647                                                       &toplevel,
 22648                                                       &was_frame);
 22649                   else
 22650                     target = x_dnd_fill_empty_target (&target_proto,
 22651                                                       &motif_style,
 22652                                                       &toplevel,
 22653                                                       &was_frame);
 22654 
 22655                   if (toplevel != x_dnd_last_seen_toplevel)
 22656                     {
 22657                       if (toplevel != FRAME_OUTER_WINDOW (x_dnd_frame)
 22658                           && x_dnd_return_frame == 1)
 22659                         x_dnd_return_frame = 2;
 22660 
 22661                       if (x_dnd_return_frame == 2
 22662                           && x_any_window_to_frame (dpyinfo, toplevel))
 22663                         {
 22664                           if (x_dnd_last_seen_window != None
 22665                               && x_dnd_last_protocol_version != -1
 22666                               && x_dnd_last_seen_window != FRAME_OUTER_WINDOW (x_dnd_frame))
 22667                             x_dnd_send_leave (x_dnd_frame, x_dnd_last_seen_window,
 22668                                               x_dnd_last_seen_toplevel);
 22669                           else if (x_dnd_last_seen_window != None
 22670                                    && XM_DRAG_STYLE_IS_DYNAMIC (x_dnd_last_motif_style)
 22671                                    && !x_dnd_disable_motif_drag
 22672                                    && x_dnd_last_seen_window != FRAME_OUTER_WINDOW (x_dnd_frame))
 22673                             {
 22674                               if (!x_dnd_motif_setup_p)
 22675                                 xm_setup_drag_info (dpyinfo, x_dnd_frame);
 22676 
 22677                               lmsg.reason = XM_DRAG_REASON (XM_DRAG_ORIGINATOR_INITIATOR,
 22678                                                             XM_DRAG_REASON_TOP_LEVEL_LEAVE);
 22679                               lmsg.byteorder = XM_BYTE_ORDER_CUR_FIRST;
 22680                               lmsg.zero = 0;
 22681                               lmsg.timestamp = xev->time;
 22682                               lmsg.source_window = FRAME_X_WINDOW (x_dnd_frame);
 22683 
 22684                               if (x_dnd_motif_setup_p)
 22685                                 xm_send_top_level_leave_message (dpyinfo, FRAME_X_WINDOW (x_dnd_frame),
 22686                                                                  x_dnd_last_seen_window, &lmsg);
 22687                             }
 22688 
 22689                           x_dnd_end_window = x_dnd_last_seen_window;
 22690                           x_dnd_last_seen_window = None;
 22691                           x_dnd_last_seen_toplevel = None;
 22692                           x_dnd_in_progress = false;
 22693                           x_dnd_return_frame_object
 22694                             = x_any_window_to_frame (dpyinfo, toplevel);
 22695                           x_dnd_return_frame = 3;
 22696                           x_dnd_waiting_for_finish = false;
 22697                           target = None;
 22698                         }
 22699                     }
 22700 
 22701                   if (target != x_dnd_last_seen_window)
 22702                     {
 22703                       if (x_dnd_last_seen_window != None
 22704                           && x_dnd_last_protocol_version != -1
 22705                           && x_dnd_last_seen_window != FRAME_OUTER_WINDOW (x_dnd_frame))
 22706                         x_dnd_send_leave (x_dnd_frame, x_dnd_last_seen_window,
 22707                                           x_dnd_last_seen_toplevel);
 22708                       else if (x_dnd_last_seen_window != None
 22709                                && XM_DRAG_STYLE_IS_DYNAMIC (x_dnd_last_motif_style)
 22710                                && !x_dnd_disable_motif_drag
 22711                                && x_dnd_last_seen_window != FRAME_OUTER_WINDOW (x_dnd_frame))
 22712                         {
 22713                           if (!x_dnd_motif_setup_p)
 22714                             xm_setup_drag_info (dpyinfo, x_dnd_frame);
 22715 
 22716                           /* This is apparently required.  If we don't
 22717                              send a motion event with the current root
 22718                              window coordinates of the pointer before
 22719                              the top level leave, then Motif displays
 22720                              an ugly black border around the previous
 22721                              drop site.  */
 22722 
 22723                           dmsg.reason = XM_DRAG_REASON (XM_DRAG_ORIGINATOR_INITIATOR,
 22724                                                         XM_DRAG_REASON_DRAG_MOTION);
 22725                           dmsg.byteorder = XM_BYTE_ORDER_CUR_FIRST;
 22726                           dmsg.side_effects
 22727                             = XM_DRAG_SIDE_EFFECT (xm_side_effect_from_action (dpyinfo,
 22728                                                                                x_dnd_wanted_action),
 22729                                                    XM_DROP_SITE_NONE, x_dnd_motif_operations,
 22730                                                    XM_DROP_ACTION_DROP_CANCEL);
 22731                           dmsg.timestamp = xev->time;
 22732                           dmsg.x = lrint (xev->root_x);
 22733                           dmsg.y = lrint (xev->root_y);
 22734 
 22735                           lmsg.reason = XM_DRAG_REASON (XM_DRAG_ORIGINATOR_INITIATOR,
 22736                                                         XM_DRAG_REASON_TOP_LEVEL_LEAVE);
 22737                           lmsg.byteorder = XM_BYTE_ORDER_CUR_FIRST;
 22738                           lmsg.zero = 0;
 22739                           lmsg.timestamp = xev->time;
 22740                           lmsg.source_window = FRAME_X_WINDOW (x_dnd_frame);
 22741 
 22742                           if (x_dnd_motif_setup_p)
 22743                             {
 22744                               xm_send_drag_motion_message (dpyinfo, FRAME_X_WINDOW (x_dnd_frame),
 22745                                                            x_dnd_last_seen_window, &dmsg);
 22746                               xm_send_top_level_leave_message (dpyinfo, FRAME_X_WINDOW (x_dnd_frame),
 22747                                                                x_dnd_last_seen_window, &lmsg);
 22748                             }
 22749                         }
 22750 
 22751                       x_dnd_action = None;
 22752                       x_dnd_last_seen_toplevel = toplevel;
 22753                       x_dnd_last_seen_window = target;
 22754                       x_dnd_last_protocol_version = target_proto;
 22755                       x_dnd_last_motif_style = motif_style;
 22756                       x_dnd_last_window_is_frame = was_frame;
 22757 
 22758                       if (target != None && x_dnd_last_protocol_version != -1)
 22759                         x_dnd_send_enter (x_dnd_frame, target,
 22760                                           x_dnd_last_seen_toplevel,
 22761                                           x_dnd_last_protocol_version);
 22762                       else if (target != None && XM_DRAG_STYLE_IS_DYNAMIC (x_dnd_last_motif_style)
 22763                                && !x_dnd_disable_motif_drag)
 22764                         {
 22765                           if (!x_dnd_motif_setup_p)
 22766                             xm_setup_drag_info (dpyinfo, x_dnd_frame);
 22767 
 22768                           emsg.reason = XM_DRAG_REASON (XM_DRAG_ORIGINATOR_INITIATOR,
 22769                                                         XM_DRAG_REASON_TOP_LEVEL_ENTER);
 22770                           emsg.byteorder = XM_BYTE_ORDER_CUR_FIRST;
 22771                           emsg.zero = 0;
 22772                           emsg.timestamp = xev->time;
 22773                           emsg.source_window = FRAME_X_WINDOW (x_dnd_frame);
 22774                           emsg.index_atom = x_dnd_motif_atom;
 22775 
 22776                           if (x_dnd_motif_setup_p)
 22777                             xm_send_top_level_enter_message (dpyinfo, FRAME_X_WINDOW (x_dnd_frame),
 22778                                                              target, &emsg);
 22779                         }
 22780                     }
 22781                   else
 22782                     x_dnd_last_seen_toplevel = toplevel;
 22783 
 22784                   if (x_dnd_last_window_is_frame && target != None)
 22785                     x_dnd_note_self_position (dpyinfo, target,
 22786                                               lrint (xev->root_x),
 22787                                               lrint (xev->root_y));
 22788                   else if (x_dnd_last_protocol_version != -1 && target != None)
 22789                     {
 22790                       dnd_state = xi_convert_event_state (xev);
 22791 
 22792                       x_dnd_send_position (x_dnd_frame, target,
 22793                                            x_dnd_last_seen_toplevel,
 22794                                            x_dnd_last_protocol_version,
 22795                                            lrint (xev->root_x),
 22796                                            lrint (xev->root_y),
 22797                                            x_dnd_selection_timestamp,
 22798                                            x_dnd_wanted_action, 0,
 22799                                            dnd_state);
 22800                     }
 22801                   else if (XM_DRAG_STYLE_IS_DYNAMIC (x_dnd_last_motif_style) && target != None
 22802                            && !x_dnd_disable_motif_drag)
 22803                     {
 22804                       if (!x_dnd_motif_setup_p)
 22805                         xm_setup_drag_info (dpyinfo, x_dnd_frame);
 22806 
 22807                       dmsg.reason = XM_DRAG_REASON (XM_DRAG_ORIGINATOR_INITIATOR,
 22808                                                     XM_DRAG_REASON_DRAG_MOTION);
 22809                       dmsg.byteorder = XM_BYTE_ORDER_CUR_FIRST;
 22810                       dmsg.side_effects
 22811                         = XM_DRAG_SIDE_EFFECT (xm_side_effect_from_action (dpyinfo,
 22812                                                                            x_dnd_wanted_action),
 22813                                                XM_DROP_SITE_VALID, x_dnd_motif_operations,
 22814                                                (!x_dnd_xm_use_help
 22815                                                 ? XM_DROP_ACTION_DROP
 22816                                                 : XM_DROP_ACTION_DROP_HELP));
 22817                       dmsg.timestamp = xev->time;
 22818                       dmsg.x = lrint (xev->root_x);
 22819                       dmsg.y = lrint (xev->root_y);
 22820 
 22821                       if (x_dnd_motif_setup_p)
 22822                         xm_send_drag_motion_message (dpyinfo, FRAME_X_WINDOW (x_dnd_frame),
 22823                                                      target, &dmsg);
 22824                     }
 22825 
 22826                   x_dnd_update_tooltip_position (xev->root_x, xev->root_y);
 22827 
 22828                   goto XI_OTHER;
 22829                 }
 22830 
 22831 #ifdef USE_GTK
 22832               if (f && xg_event_is_for_scrollbar (f, event, false))
 22833                 f = 0;
 22834 #endif
 22835               if (f)
 22836                 {
 22837                   if (xev->event != FRAME_X_WINDOW (f))
 22838                     {
 22839                       x_translate_coordinates (f, lrint (xev->root_x),
 22840                                                lrint (xev->root_y),
 22841                                                &ev.x, &ev.y);
 22842                       ev.window = FRAME_X_WINDOW (f);
 22843                     }
 22844 
 22845                   /* Maybe generate a SELECT_WINDOW_EVENT for
 22846                      `mouse-autoselect-window' but don't let popup menus
 22847                      interfere with this (Bug#1261).  */
 22848                   if (!NILP (Vmouse_autoselect_window)
 22849                       && !popup_activated ()
 22850                       /* Don't switch if we're currently in the minibuffer.
 22851                          This tries to work around problems where the
 22852                          minibuffer gets unselected unexpectedly, and where
 22853                          you then have to move your mouse all the way down to
 22854                          the minibuffer to select it.  */
 22855                       && !MINI_WINDOW_P (XWINDOW (selected_window))
 22856                       /* With `focus-follows-mouse' non-nil create an event
 22857                          also when the target window is on another frame.  */
 22858                       && (f == XFRAME (selected_frame)
 22859                           || !NILP (focus_follows_mouse)))
 22860                     {
 22861                       static Lisp_Object last_mouse_window;
 22862                       Lisp_Object window = window_from_coordinates (f, ev.x, ev.y, 0, false, false);
 22863 
 22864                       /* A window will be autoselected only when it is not
 22865                          selected now and the last mouse movement event was
 22866                          not in it.  The remainder of the code is a bit vague
 22867                          wrt what a "window" is.  For immediate autoselection,
 22868                          the window is usually the entire window but for GTK
 22869                          where the scroll bars don't count.  For delayed
 22870                          autoselection the window is usually the window's text
 22871                          area including the margins.  */
 22872                       if (WINDOWP (window)
 22873                           && !EQ (window, last_mouse_window)
 22874                           && !EQ (window, selected_window))
 22875                         {
 22876                           inev.ie.kind = SELECT_WINDOW_EVENT;
 22877                           inev.ie.frame_or_window = window;
 22878 
 22879                           if (source)
 22880                             inev.ie.device = source->name;
 22881                         }
 22882 
 22883                       /* Remember the last window where we saw the mouse.  */
 22884                       last_mouse_window = window;
 22885                     }
 22886 
 22887                   if (!x_note_mouse_movement (f, &ev, source ? source->name : Qnil))
 22888                     help_echo_string = previous_help_echo_string;
 22889                 }
 22890               else
 22891                 {
 22892 #ifndef USE_TOOLKIT_SCROLL_BARS
 22893                   struct scroll_bar *bar
 22894                     = x_window_to_scroll_bar (dpyinfo->display, xev->event, 2);
 22895 
 22896                   if (bar)
 22897                     x_scroll_bar_note_movement (bar, &ev);
 22898 #endif /* USE_TOOLKIT_SCROLL_BARS */
 22899 
 22900                   /* If we move outside the frame, then we're
 22901                      certainly no longer on any text in the frame.  */
 22902                   clear_mouse_face (hlinfo);
 22903                 }
 22904 
 22905               /* If the contents of the global variable help_echo_string
 22906                  has changed, generate a HELP_EVENT.  */
 22907               if (!NILP (help_echo_string)
 22908                   || !NILP (previous_help_echo_string))
 22909                 {
 22910                   /* Also allow the focus and client pointer to be
 22911                      adjusted accordingly, in case a help tooltip is
 22912                      shown.  */
 22913                   gen_help_device = device;
 22914                   gen_help_time = xev->time;
 22915 
 22916                   do_help = 1;
 22917                 }
 22918 
 22919               if (f)
 22920                 x_flush_dirty_back_buffer_on (f);
 22921               goto XI_OTHER;
 22922             }
 22923 
 22924           case XI_ButtonRelease:
 22925           case XI_ButtonPress:
 22926             {
 22927               /* If we decide we want to generate an event to be seen
 22928                  by the rest of Emacs, we put it here.  */
 22929               Lisp_Object tab_bar_arg = Qnil;
 22930               bool tab_bar_p = false;
 22931               bool tool_bar_p = false;
 22932               struct xi_device_t *device, *source;
 22933 #ifdef HAVE_XWIDGETS
 22934               struct xwidget_view *xvw;
 22935 #endif
 22936               /* A fake XButtonEvent for x_construct_mouse_click. */
 22937               XButtonEvent bv;
 22938               bool dnd_grab = false;
 22939               int dnd_state;
 22940 
 22941               if (x_dnd_in_progress
 22942                   && (command_loop_level + minibuf_level
 22943                       <= x_dnd_recursion_depth)
 22944                   && xev->deviceid == x_dnd_pointer_device
 22945                   && dpyinfo == FRAME_DISPLAY_INFO (x_dnd_frame))
 22946                 {
 22947                   f = mouse_or_wdesc_frame (dpyinfo, xev->event);
 22948                   device = xi_device_from_id (dpyinfo, xev->deviceid);
 22949 
 22950                   if (f && xev->event == FRAME_X_WINDOW (f))
 22951                     /* See the comment above
 22952                        x_compute_root_window_offset for why this
 22953                        optimization is performed.  */
 22954                     xi_compute_root_window_offset (f, xev);
 22955 
 22956                   /* Don't track grab status for emulated pointer
 22957                      events, because they are ignored by the regular
 22958                      mouse click processing code.  */
 22959 #ifdef XIPointerEmulated
 22960                   if (!(xev->flags & XIPointerEmulated))
 22961                     {
 22962 #endif
 22963                       if (xev->evtype == XI_ButtonPress)
 22964                         {
 22965                           x_display_set_last_user_time (dpyinfo, xev->time,
 22966                                                         xev->send_event, true);
 22967 
 22968                           dpyinfo->grabbed |= (1 << xev->detail);
 22969                           dpyinfo->last_mouse_frame = f;
 22970 
 22971                           if (device)
 22972                             device->grab |= (1 << xev->detail);
 22973 
 22974                           if (f)
 22975                             f->last_tab_bar_item = -1;
 22976 #if ! defined (USE_GTK)
 22977                           if (f)
 22978                             f->last_tool_bar_item = -1;
 22979 #endif /* not USE_GTK */
 22980                         }
 22981                       else
 22982                         {
 22983                           dpyinfo->grabbed &= ~(1 << xev->detail);
 22984                           if (device)
 22985                             device->grab &= ~(1 << xev->detail);
 22986                         }
 22987 #ifdef XIPointerEmulated
 22988                     }
 22989 #endif
 22990 
 22991                   if (f && device)
 22992                     xi_handle_interaction (dpyinfo, f, device,
 22993                                            xev->time);
 22994 
 22995                   if (xev->evtype == XI_ButtonPress
 22996                       && x_dnd_last_seen_window != None)
 22997                     {
 22998                       dnd_state = xi_convert_event_state (xev);
 22999 
 23000                       if (x_dnd_last_window_is_frame)
 23001                         {
 23002 #ifdef XI_PointerEmulated
 23003                           /* Set the last user time here even if this
 23004                              is an emulated button event, since
 23005                              something happened in response.  */
 23006 
 23007                           if (xev->flags & XIPointerEmulated)
 23008                             x_display_set_last_user_time (dpyinfo, xev->time,
 23009                                                           xev->send_event, true);
 23010 #endif
 23011                           x_dnd_note_self_wheel (dpyinfo,
 23012                                                  x_dnd_last_seen_window,
 23013                                                  lrint (xev->root_x),
 23014                                                  lrint (xev->root_y),
 23015                                                  xev->detail, dnd_state,
 23016                                                  xev->time);
 23017                         }
 23018                       else
 23019                         x_dnd_send_position (x_dnd_frame,
 23020                                              x_dnd_last_seen_window,
 23021                                              x_dnd_last_seen_toplevel,
 23022                                              x_dnd_last_protocol_version,
 23023                                              lrint (xev->root_x),
 23024                                              lrint (xev->root_y),
 23025                                              xev->time, x_dnd_wanted_action,
 23026                                              xev->detail, dnd_state);
 23027 
 23028                       goto OTHER;
 23029                     }
 23030 
 23031                   if (xev->evtype == XI_ButtonRelease)
 23032                     {
 23033                       for (int i = 0; i < xev->buttons.mask_len * 8; ++i)
 23034                         {
 23035                           if (i != xev->detail && XIMaskIsSet (xev->buttons.mask, i))
 23036                             dnd_grab = true;
 23037                         }
 23038 
 23039                       if (!dnd_grab)
 23040                         {
 23041                           x_dnd_end_window = x_dnd_last_seen_window;
 23042                           x_dnd_in_progress = false;
 23043 
 23044                           /* If a tooltip that we're following is
 23045                              displayed, hide it now.  */
 23046 
 23047                           if (x_dnd_update_tooltip
 23048                               && FRAMEP (tip_frame)
 23049                               && FRAME_LIVE_P (XFRAME (tip_frame))
 23050                               && (FRAME_X_DISPLAY (XFRAME (tip_frame))
 23051                                   == FRAME_X_DISPLAY (x_dnd_frame)))
 23052                             Fx_hide_tip ();
 23053 
 23054                           /* This doesn't have to be marked since it
 23055                              is only accessed if
 23056                              x_dnd_waiting_for_finish is true, which
 23057                              is only possible inside the DND event
 23058                              loop where that frame is on the
 23059                              stack.  */
 23060                           x_dnd_finish_frame = x_dnd_frame;
 23061 
 23062                           if (x_dnd_last_seen_window != None
 23063                               && x_dnd_last_window_is_frame)
 23064                             {
 23065                               x_dnd_waiting_for_finish = false;
 23066                               x_dnd_note_self_drop (dpyinfo, x_dnd_last_seen_window,
 23067                                                     lrint (xev->root_x),
 23068                                                     lrint (xev->root_y), xev->time);
 23069                             }
 23070                           else if (x_dnd_last_seen_window != None
 23071                                    && x_dnd_last_protocol_version != -1)
 23072                             {
 23073                               x_dnd_pending_finish_target = x_dnd_last_seen_toplevel;
 23074                               x_dnd_waiting_for_finish_proto = x_dnd_last_protocol_version;
 23075 
 23076                               x_dnd_waiting_for_finish
 23077                                 = x_dnd_do_drop (x_dnd_last_seen_window,
 23078                                                  x_dnd_last_seen_toplevel,
 23079                                                  x_dnd_last_protocol_version);
 23080                               x_dnd_finish_display = dpyinfo->display;
 23081                             }
 23082                           else if (x_dnd_last_seen_window != None)
 23083                             {
 23084                               xm_drop_start_message dmsg;
 23085                               xm_drag_receiver_info drag_receiver_info;
 23086 
 23087                               if (!xm_read_drag_receiver_info (dpyinfo, x_dnd_last_seen_window,
 23088                                                                &drag_receiver_info)
 23089                                   && !x_dnd_disable_motif_protocol
 23090                                   && drag_receiver_info.protocol_style != XM_DRAG_STYLE_NONE
 23091                                   && (x_dnd_allow_current_frame
 23092                                       || x_dnd_last_seen_window != FRAME_OUTER_WINDOW (x_dnd_frame)))
 23093                                 {
 23094                                   if (!x_dnd_motif_setup_p)
 23095                                     xm_setup_drag_info (dpyinfo, x_dnd_frame);
 23096 
 23097                                   if (x_dnd_motif_setup_p)
 23098                                     {
 23099                                       memset (&dmsg, 0, sizeof dmsg);
 23100 
 23101                                       dmsg.reason = XM_DRAG_REASON (XM_DRAG_ORIGINATOR_INITIATOR,
 23102                                                                     XM_DRAG_REASON_DROP_START);
 23103                                       dmsg.byte_order = XM_BYTE_ORDER_CUR_FIRST;
 23104                                       dmsg.side_effects
 23105                                         = XM_DRAG_SIDE_EFFECT (xm_side_effect_from_action (dpyinfo,
 23106                                                                                            x_dnd_wanted_action),
 23107                                                                XM_DROP_SITE_VALID, x_dnd_motif_operations,
 23108                                                                (!x_dnd_xm_use_help
 23109                                                                 ? XM_DROP_ACTION_DROP
 23110                                                                 : XM_DROP_ACTION_DROP_HELP));
 23111                                       dmsg.timestamp = xev->time;
 23112                                       dmsg.x = lrint (xev->root_x);
 23113                                       dmsg.y = lrint (xev->root_y);
 23114                                       /* This atom technically has to be
 23115                                          unique to each drag-and-drop
 23116                                          operation, but that isn't easy to
 23117                                          accomplish, since we cannot
 23118                                          randomly move data around between
 23119                                          selections.  Let's hope no two
 23120                                          instances of Emacs try to drag
 23121                                          into the same window at the same
 23122                                          time.  */
 23123                                       dmsg.index_atom = x_dnd_motif_atom;
 23124                                       dmsg.source_window = FRAME_X_WINDOW (x_dnd_frame);
 23125 
 23126                                       if (!XM_DRAG_STYLE_IS_DROP_ONLY (drag_receiver_info.protocol_style))
 23127                                         x_dnd_send_xm_leave_for_drop (FRAME_DISPLAY_INFO (x_dnd_frame),
 23128                                                                       x_dnd_frame, x_dnd_last_seen_window,
 23129                                                                       xev->time);
 23130 
 23131                                       xm_send_drop_message (dpyinfo, FRAME_X_WINDOW (x_dnd_frame),
 23132                                                             x_dnd_last_seen_window, &dmsg);
 23133 
 23134                                       x_dnd_waiting_for_finish = true;
 23135                                       x_dnd_waiting_for_motif_finish_display = dpyinfo;
 23136                                       x_dnd_waiting_for_motif_finish = 1;
 23137                                       x_dnd_finish_display = dpyinfo->display;
 23138                                     }
 23139                                 }
 23140                               else
 23141                                 x_dnd_send_unsupported_drop (dpyinfo, (x_dnd_last_seen_toplevel != None
 23142                                                                        ? x_dnd_last_seen_toplevel
 23143                                                                        : x_dnd_last_seen_window),
 23144                                                              lrint (xev->root_x),
 23145                                                              lrint (xev->root_y), xev->time);
 23146                             }
 23147                           else if (x_dnd_last_seen_toplevel != None)
 23148                             x_dnd_send_unsupported_drop (dpyinfo,
 23149                                                          x_dnd_last_seen_toplevel,
 23150                                                          lrint (xev->root_x),
 23151                                                          lrint (xev->root_y),
 23152                                                          xev->time);
 23153 
 23154                           x_dnd_last_protocol_version = -1;
 23155                           x_dnd_last_motif_style = XM_DRAG_STYLE_NONE;
 23156                           x_dnd_last_seen_window = None;
 23157                           x_dnd_last_seen_toplevel = None;
 23158                           x_dnd_last_window_is_frame = false;
 23159                           x_dnd_frame = NULL;
 23160 
 23161                           goto XI_OTHER;
 23162                         }
 23163                     }
 23164                 }
 23165 
 23166               if (x_dnd_in_progress
 23167                   && (command_loop_level + minibuf_level
 23168                       <= x_dnd_recursion_depth))
 23169                 goto XI_OTHER;
 23170 
 23171 #ifdef USE_MOTIF
 23172 #ifdef USE_TOOLKIT_SCROLL_BARS
 23173               struct scroll_bar *bar
 23174                 = x_window_to_scroll_bar (dpyinfo->display,
 23175                                           xev->event, 2);
 23176 #endif
 23177 
 23178               use_copy = true;
 23179               copy.xbutton.type = (xev->evtype == XI_ButtonPress
 23180                                    ? ButtonPress : ButtonRelease);
 23181               copy.xbutton.serial = xev->serial;
 23182               copy.xbutton.send_event = xev->send_event;
 23183               copy.xbutton.display = dpyinfo->display;
 23184               copy.xbutton.window = xev->event;
 23185               copy.xbutton.root = xev->root;
 23186               copy.xbutton.subwindow = xev->child;
 23187               copy.xbutton.time = xev->time;
 23188               copy.xbutton.x = lrint (xev->event_x);
 23189               copy.xbutton.y = lrint (xev->event_y);
 23190               copy.xbutton.x_root = lrint (xev->root_x);
 23191               copy.xbutton.y_root = lrint (xev->root_y);
 23192               copy.xbutton.state = xi_convert_event_state (xev);
 23193               copy.xbutton.button = xev->detail;
 23194               copy.xbutton.same_screen = True;
 23195 
 23196 #elif defined USE_GTK && !defined HAVE_GTK3
 23197               copy = gdk_event_new (xev->evtype == XI_ButtonPress
 23198                                     ? GDK_BUTTON_PRESS : GDK_BUTTON_RELEASE);
 23199 
 23200               copy->button.window = gdk_x11_window_lookup_for_display (gdpy, xev->event);
 23201               copy->button.send_event = xev->send_event;
 23202               copy->button.time = xev->time;
 23203               copy->button.x = xev->event_x;
 23204               copy->button.y = xev->event_y;
 23205               copy->button.x_root = xev->root_x;
 23206               copy->button.y_root = xev->root_y;
 23207               copy->button.state = xi_convert_event_state (xev);
 23208               copy->button.button = xev->detail;
 23209 
 23210               if (!copy->button.window)
 23211                 emacs_abort ();
 23212 
 23213               g_object_ref (copy->button.window);
 23214 
 23215               if (popup_activated ())
 23216                 {
 23217                   /* GTK+ popup menus don't respond to core buttons
 23218                      after Button3, so don't dismiss popup menus upon
 23219                      wheel movement here either.  */
 23220                   if (xev->detail > 3)
 23221                     *finish = X_EVENT_DROP;
 23222 
 23223                   if (xev->evtype == XI_ButtonRelease)
 23224                     goto XI_OTHER;
 23225                 }
 23226 #endif
 23227 
 23228 #ifdef HAVE_XINPUT2_1
 23229               /* Ignore emulated scroll events when XI2 native
 23230                  scroll events are present.  */
 23231               if (xev->flags & XIPointerEmulated)
 23232                 {
 23233 #if !defined USE_MOTIF || !defined USE_TOOLKIT_SCROLL_BARS
 23234                   *finish = X_EVENT_DROP;
 23235 #else
 23236                   if (bar)
 23237                     *finish = X_EVENT_DROP;
 23238 #endif
 23239                   goto XI_OTHER;
 23240                 }
 23241 #endif
 23242 
 23243               if (xev->evtype == XI_ButtonPress)
 23244                 x_display_set_last_user_time (dpyinfo, xev->time,
 23245                                               xev->send_event, true);
 23246 
 23247               source = xi_device_from_id (dpyinfo, xev->sourceid);
 23248               device = xi_device_from_id (dpyinfo, xev->deviceid);
 23249 
 23250 #ifdef HAVE_XWIDGETS
 23251               xvw = xwidget_view_from_window (xev->event);
 23252               if (xvw)
 23253                 {
 23254                   /* If the user interacts with a frame that's focused
 23255                      on another device, but not the current focus
 23256                      frame, make it the focus frame.  */
 23257                   if (device)
 23258                     xi_handle_interaction (dpyinfo, xvw->frame,
 23259                                            device, xev->time);
 23260 
 23261                   xwidget_button (xvw, xev->evtype == XI_ButtonPress,
 23262                                   lrint (xev->event_x), lrint (xev->event_y),
 23263                                   xev->detail, xi_convert_event_state (xev),
 23264                                   xev->time);
 23265 
 23266                   if (!EQ (selected_window, xvw->w) && (xev->detail < 4))
 23267                     {
 23268                       inev.ie.kind = SELECT_WINDOW_EVENT;
 23269                       inev.ie.frame_or_window = xvw->w;
 23270 
 23271                       if (source)
 23272                         inev.ie.device = source->name;
 23273                     }
 23274 
 23275                   *finish = X_EVENT_DROP;
 23276                   goto XI_OTHER;
 23277                 }
 23278 #endif
 23279 
 23280               if (!device)
 23281                 goto XI_OTHER;
 23282 
 23283               bv.button = xev->detail;
 23284               bv.type = xev->evtype == XI_ButtonPress ? ButtonPress : ButtonRelease;
 23285               bv.x = lrint (xev->event_x);
 23286               bv.y = lrint (xev->event_y);
 23287               bv.x_root = lrint (xev->root_x);
 23288               bv.y_root = lrint (xev->root_y);
 23289               bv.window = xev->event;
 23290               bv.state = xi_convert_event_state (xev);
 23291               bv.time = xev->time;
 23292 
 23293               dpyinfo->last_mouse_glyph_frame = NULL;
 23294 
 23295               f = mouse_or_wdesc_frame (dpyinfo, xev->event);
 23296 
 23297               if (f && xev->event == FRAME_X_WINDOW (f))
 23298                 /* See the comment above x_compute_root_window_offset
 23299                    for why this optimization is performed.  */
 23300                 xi_compute_root_window_offset (f, xev);
 23301 
 23302               if (f && xev->evtype == XI_ButtonPress
 23303                   && !popup_activated ()
 23304                   && !x_window_to_scroll_bar (dpyinfo->display, xev->event, 2)
 23305                   && !FRAME_NO_ACCEPT_FOCUS (f))
 23306                 {
 23307                   /* When clicking into a child frame or when clicking
 23308                      into a parent frame with the child frame selected and
 23309                      `no-accept-focus' is not set, select the clicked
 23310                      frame.  */
 23311                   struct frame *hf = dpyinfo->highlight_frame;
 23312 
 23313                   if (FRAME_PARENT_FRAME (f) || (hf && frame_ancestor_p (f, hf)))
 23314                     {
 23315 #if defined HAVE_GTK3 || (!defined USE_GTK && !defined USE_X_TOOLKIT)
 23316                       if (device)
 23317                         {
 23318                           /* This can generate XI_BadDevice if the
 23319                              device's attachment was destroyed
 23320                              server-side.  */
 23321                           x_ignore_errors_for_next_request (dpyinfo, 0);
 23322                           XISetFocus (dpyinfo->display, device->attachment,
 23323                                       /* Note that the input extension
 23324                                          only supports RevertToParent-type
 23325                                          behavior.  */
 23326                                       FRAME_OUTER_WINDOW (f), xev->time);
 23327                           x_stop_ignoring_errors (dpyinfo);
 23328                         }
 23329 #else
 23330                       /* Non-no toolkit builds without GTK 3 use core
 23331                          events to handle focus.  Errors are still
 23332                          caught here in case the window is not
 23333                          viewable.  */
 23334                       x_ignore_errors_for_next_request (dpyinfo, 0);
 23335                       XSetInputFocus (FRAME_X_DISPLAY (f), FRAME_OUTER_WINDOW (f),
 23336                                       RevertToParent, xev->time);
 23337                       x_stop_ignoring_errors (dpyinfo);
 23338 #endif
 23339                       if (FRAME_PARENT_FRAME (f))
 23340                         XRaiseWindow (FRAME_X_DISPLAY (f), FRAME_OUTER_WINDOW (f));
 23341                     }
 23342                 }
 23343 
 23344               if (f)
 23345                 {
 23346                   /* If the user interacts with a frame that's focused
 23347                      on another device, but not the current focus
 23348                      frame, make it the focus frame.  */
 23349                   if (device)
 23350                     xi_handle_interaction (dpyinfo, f, device,
 23351                                            xev->time);
 23352                 }
 23353 
 23354 #ifdef USE_GTK
 23355               if (!f)
 23356                 {
 23357                   int real_x = lrint (xev->root_x);
 23358                   int real_y = lrint (xev->root_y);
 23359 
 23360                   f = x_any_window_to_frame (dpyinfo, xev->event);
 23361 
 23362                   if (xev->detail > 3 && xev->detail < 8 && f)
 23363                     {
 23364                       if (xev->evtype == XI_ButtonRelease)
 23365                         {
 23366                           if (FRAME_X_WINDOW (f) != xev->event)
 23367                             x_translate_coordinates (f, real_x, real_y,
 23368                                                      &real_x, &real_y);
 23369 
 23370                           if (xev->detail <= 5)
 23371                             inev.ie.kind = WHEEL_EVENT;
 23372                           else
 23373                             inev.ie.kind = HORIZ_WHEEL_EVENT;
 23374 
 23375                           if (source)
 23376                             inev.ie.device = source->name;
 23377 
 23378                           inev.ie.timestamp = xev->time;
 23379 
 23380                           XSETINT (inev.ie.x, real_x);
 23381                           XSETINT (inev.ie.y, real_y);
 23382                           XSETFRAME (inev.ie.frame_or_window, f);
 23383 
 23384                           inev.ie.modifiers
 23385                             |= x_x_to_emacs_modifiers (dpyinfo,
 23386                                                        xev->mods.effective);
 23387 
 23388                           inev.ie.modifiers |= xev->detail % 2 ? down_modifier : up_modifier;
 23389                         }
 23390 
 23391                       *finish = X_EVENT_DROP;
 23392                       goto XI_OTHER;
 23393                     }
 23394                   else
 23395                     f = NULL;
 23396                 }
 23397 
 23398               if (f && xg_event_is_for_scrollbar (f, event, false))
 23399                 f = 0;
 23400 #endif
 23401 
 23402               if (f)
 23403                 {
 23404                   if (xev->detail >= 4 && xev->detail < 8)
 23405                     {
 23406                       if (xev->evtype == XI_ButtonRelease)
 23407                         {
 23408                           if (xev->detail <= 5)
 23409                             inev.ie.kind = WHEEL_EVENT;
 23410                           else
 23411                             inev.ie.kind = HORIZ_WHEEL_EVENT;
 23412 
 23413                           if (source)
 23414                             inev.ie.device = source->name;
 23415 
 23416                           inev.ie.timestamp = xev->time;
 23417 
 23418                           XSETINT (inev.ie.x, lrint (xev->event_x));
 23419                           XSETINT (inev.ie.y, lrint (xev->event_y));
 23420                           XSETFRAME (inev.ie.frame_or_window, f);
 23421 
 23422                           inev.ie.modifiers
 23423                             |= x_x_to_emacs_modifiers (dpyinfo,
 23424                                                        xev->mods.effective);
 23425 
 23426                           inev.ie.modifiers |= xev->detail % 2 ? down_modifier : up_modifier;
 23427                         }
 23428 
 23429                       goto XI_OTHER;
 23430                     }
 23431 
 23432                   /* Is this in the tab-bar?  */
 23433                   if (WINDOWP (f->tab_bar_window)
 23434                       && WINDOW_TOTAL_LINES (XWINDOW (f->tab_bar_window)))
 23435                     {
 23436                       Lisp_Object window;
 23437                       int x = bv.x;
 23438                       int y = bv.y;
 23439 
 23440                       window = window_from_coordinates (f, x, y, 0, true, true);
 23441                       tab_bar_p = EQ (window, f->tab_bar_window);
 23442 
 23443                       if (tab_bar_p)
 23444                         {
 23445                           tab_bar_arg = handle_tab_bar_click
 23446                             (f, x, y, xev->evtype == XI_ButtonPress,
 23447                              x_x_to_emacs_modifiers (dpyinfo, bv.state));
 23448                           x_flush_dirty_back_buffer_on (f);
 23449                         }
 23450                     }
 23451 
 23452 #if ! defined (USE_GTK)
 23453                   /* Is this in the tool-bar?  */
 23454                   if (WINDOWP (f->tool_bar_window)
 23455                       && WINDOW_TOTAL_LINES (XWINDOW (f->tool_bar_window)))
 23456                     {
 23457                       Lisp_Object window;
 23458                       int x = bv.x;
 23459                       int y = bv.y;
 23460 
 23461                       window = window_from_coordinates (f, x, y, 0, true, true);
 23462                       /* Ignore button release events if the mouse
 23463                          wasn't previously pressed on the tool bar.
 23464                          We do this because otherwise selecting some
 23465                          text with the mouse and then releasing it on
 23466                          the tool bar doesn't stop selecting text,
 23467                          since the tool bar eats the button up
 23468                          event.  */
 23469                       tool_bar_p = (EQ (window, f->tool_bar_window)
 23470                                     && (xev->evtype != XI_ButtonRelease
 23471                                         || f->last_tool_bar_item != -1));
 23472 
 23473                       if (tool_bar_p && xev->detail < 4)
 23474                         {
 23475                           handle_tool_bar_click_with_device
 23476                             (f, x, y, xev->evtype == XI_ButtonPress,
 23477                              x_x_to_emacs_modifiers (dpyinfo, bv.state),
 23478                              source ? source->name : Qt);
 23479                           x_flush_dirty_back_buffer_on (f);
 23480                         }
 23481                     }
 23482 #endif /* !USE_GTK */
 23483 
 23484                   if (!(tab_bar_p && NILP (tab_bar_arg)) && !tool_bar_p)
 23485 #if defined (USE_X_TOOLKIT) || defined (USE_GTK)
 23486                     if (! popup_activated ())
 23487 #endif
 23488                       {
 23489                         if (ignore_next_mouse_click_timeout)
 23490                           {
 23491                             if (xev->evtype == XI_ButtonPress
 23492                                 && xev->time > ignore_next_mouse_click_timeout)
 23493                               {
 23494                                 ignore_next_mouse_click_timeout = 0;
 23495                                 x_construct_mouse_click (&inev.ie, &bv, f);
 23496                               }
 23497                             if (xev->evtype == XI_ButtonRelease)
 23498                               ignore_next_mouse_click_timeout = 0;
 23499                           }
 23500                         else
 23501                           x_construct_mouse_click (&inev.ie, &bv, f);
 23502 
 23503                         if (!NILP (tab_bar_arg))
 23504                           inev.ie.arg = tab_bar_arg;
 23505                       }
 23506 
 23507                   if (FRAME_X_EMBEDDED_P (f)
 23508                       && !FRAME_NO_ACCEPT_FOCUS (f))
 23509                     xembed_send_message (f, xev->time,
 23510                                          XEMBED_REQUEST_FOCUS, 0, 0, 0);
 23511                 }
 23512               else
 23513                 {
 23514                   struct scroll_bar *bar
 23515                     = x_window_to_scroll_bar (dpyinfo->display,
 23516                                               xev->event, 2);
 23517 
 23518 #ifndef USE_TOOLKIT_SCROLL_BARS
 23519                   if (bar)
 23520                     x_scroll_bar_handle_click (bar, (XEvent *) &bv, &inev.ie,
 23521                                                source ? source->name : Qnil);
 23522 #else
 23523                   /* Make the "Ctrl-Mouse-2 splits window" work for toolkit
 23524                      scroll bars.  */
 23525                   if (bar && xev->mods.effective & ControlMask)
 23526                     {
 23527                       x_scroll_bar_handle_click (bar, (XEvent *) &bv, &inev.ie,
 23528                                                  source ? source->name : Qnil);
 23529                       *finish = X_EVENT_DROP;
 23530                     }
 23531 #endif
 23532                 }
 23533 
 23534               if (xev->evtype == XI_ButtonPress)
 23535                 {
 23536                   dpyinfo->grabbed |= (1 << xev->detail);
 23537                   device->grab |= (1 << xev->detail);
 23538                   dpyinfo->last_mouse_frame = f;
 23539                   if (f && !tab_bar_p)
 23540                     f->last_tab_bar_item = -1;
 23541 #if ! defined (USE_GTK)
 23542                   if (f && !tool_bar_p)
 23543                     f->last_tool_bar_item = -1;
 23544 #endif /* not USE_GTK */
 23545 
 23546                 }
 23547               else
 23548                 {
 23549                   dpyinfo->grabbed &= ~(1 << xev->detail);
 23550                   device->grab &= ~(1 << xev->detail);
 23551                 }
 23552 
 23553               if (source && inev.ie.kind != NO_EVENT)
 23554                 inev.ie.device = source->name;
 23555 
 23556               if (f)
 23557                 f->mouse_moved = false;
 23558 
 23559 #if defined (USE_GTK)
 23560               /* No Xt toolkit currently available has support for XI2.
 23561                  So the code here assumes use of GTK.  */
 23562               f = x_menubar_window_to_frame (dpyinfo, event);
 23563               if (f /* Gtk+ menus only react to the first three buttons. */
 23564                   && xev->detail < 3)
 23565                 {
 23566                   /* What is done with Core Input ButtonPressed is not
 23567                      possible here, because GenericEvents cannot be saved.  */
 23568                   bool was_waiting_for_input = waiting_for_input;
 23569                   /* This hack was adopted from the NS port.  Whether
 23570                      or not it is actually safe is a different story
 23571                      altogether.  */
 23572                   if (waiting_for_input)
 23573                     waiting_for_input = 0;
 23574                   set_frame_menubar (f, true);
 23575                   waiting_for_input = was_waiting_for_input;
 23576                 }
 23577 #endif
 23578               goto XI_OTHER;
 23579             }
 23580 
 23581           case XI_KeyPress:
 23582             {
 23583               int state = xev->mods.effective;
 23584               Lisp_Object c;
 23585 #ifdef HAVE_XKB
 23586               unsigned int mods_rtrn;
 23587 #endif
 23588               int keycode = xev->detail;
 23589               KeySym keysym;
 23590               char copy_buffer[81];
 23591               char *copy_bufptr = copy_buffer;
 23592               int copy_bufsiz = sizeof (copy_buffer);
 23593               ptrdiff_t i;
 23594               unsigned int old_state;
 23595               struct xi_device_t *device, *source;
 23596 
 23597               coding = Qlatin_1;
 23598 
 23599               device = xi_device_from_id (dpyinfo, xev->deviceid);
 23600               source = xi_device_from_id (dpyinfo, xev->sourceid);
 23601 
 23602               if (!device)
 23603                 goto XI_OTHER;
 23604 
 23605 #if defined (USE_X_TOOLKIT) || defined (USE_GTK)
 23606               /* Dispatch XI_KeyPress events when in menu.  */
 23607               if (popup_activated ())
 23608                 {
 23609 #ifdef USE_LUCID
 23610                   /* This makes key navigation work inside menus.  */
 23611                   use_copy = true;
 23612                   copy.xkey.type = KeyPress;
 23613                   copy.xkey.serial = xev->serial;
 23614                   copy.xkey.send_event = xev->send_event;
 23615                   copy.xkey.display = dpyinfo->display;
 23616                   copy.xkey.window = xev->event;
 23617                   copy.xkey.root = xev->root;
 23618                   copy.xkey.subwindow = xev->child;
 23619                   copy.xkey.time = xev->time;
 23620                   copy.xkey.state = xi_convert_event_keyboard_state (xev);
 23621                   xi_convert_button_state (&xev->buttons, &copy.xkey.state);
 23622 
 23623                   copy.xkey.x = lrint (xev->event_x);
 23624                   copy.xkey.y = lrint (xev->event_y);
 23625                   copy.xkey.x_root = lrint (xev->root_x);
 23626                   copy.xkey.y_root = lrint (xev->root_y);
 23627                   copy.xkey.keycode = xev->detail;
 23628                   copy.xkey.same_screen = True;
 23629 #endif
 23630                   goto XI_OTHER;
 23631                 }
 23632 #endif
 23633 
 23634               x_display_set_last_user_time (dpyinfo, xev->time,
 23635                                             xev->send_event, true);
 23636               ignore_next_mouse_click_timeout = 0;
 23637 
 23638               f = x_any_window_to_frame (dpyinfo, xev->event);
 23639 
 23640               if (f && xev->event == FRAME_X_WINDOW (f))
 23641                 /* See the comment above x_compute_root_window_offset
 23642                    for why this optimization is performed.  */
 23643                 xi_compute_root_window_offset (f, xev);
 23644 
 23645               /* GTK handles TAB events in an undesirable manner, so
 23646                  keyboard events are always dropped.  But as a side
 23647                  effect, the user time will no longer be set by GDK,
 23648                  so do that manually.  */
 23649 #ifdef USE_GTK
 23650               if (f)
 23651                 x_set_gtk_user_time (f, xev->time);
 23652 #endif
 23653 
 23654               if (f)
 23655                 {
 23656                   /* If the user interacts with a frame that's focused
 23657                      on another device, but not the current focus
 23658                      frame, make it the focus frame.  */
 23659                   if (device)
 23660                     xi_handle_interaction (dpyinfo, f, device,
 23661                                            xev->time);
 23662                 }
 23663 
 23664               XKeyPressedEvent xkey;
 23665 
 23666               memset (&xkey, 0, sizeof xkey);
 23667 
 23668               xkey.type = KeyPress;
 23669               xkey.serial = xev->serial;
 23670               xkey.send_event = xev->send_event;
 23671               xkey.display = dpyinfo->display;
 23672               xkey.window = xev->event;
 23673               xkey.root = xev->root;
 23674               xkey.subwindow = xev->child;
 23675               xkey.time = xev->time;
 23676               xkey.state = xi_convert_event_keyboard_state (xev);
 23677 
 23678               xkey.x = lrint (xev->event_x);
 23679               xkey.y = lrint (xev->event_y);
 23680               xkey.x_root = lrint (xev->root_x);
 23681               xkey.y_root = lrint (xev->root_y);
 23682 
 23683               /* Some input methods react differently depending on the
 23684                  buttons that are pressed.  */
 23685               xi_convert_button_state (&xev->buttons, &xkey.state);
 23686 
 23687               xkey.keycode = xev->detail;
 23688               xkey.same_screen = True;
 23689 
 23690 #ifdef HAVE_X_I18N
 23691 #ifdef USE_GTK
 23692               if ((!x_gtk_use_native_input
 23693                    && x_filter_event (dpyinfo, (XEvent *) &xkey))
 23694                   || (x_gtk_use_native_input
 23695                       && x_filter_event (dpyinfo, event)))
 23696                 {
 23697                   /* Try to attribute core key events from the input
 23698                      method to the input extension event that caused
 23699                      them.  */
 23700                   dpyinfo->pending_keystroke_time = xev->time;
 23701                   dpyinfo->pending_keystroke_source = xev->sourceid;
 23702 
 23703                   *finish = X_EVENT_DROP;
 23704                   goto XI_OTHER;
 23705                 }
 23706 #else
 23707               if (x_filter_event (dpyinfo, (XEvent *) &xkey))
 23708                 {
 23709                   /* Try to attribute core key events from the input
 23710                      method to the input extension event that caused
 23711                      them.  */
 23712                   dpyinfo->pending_keystroke_time = xev->time;
 23713                   dpyinfo->pending_keystroke_source = xev->sourceid;
 23714 
 23715                   *finish = X_EVENT_DROP;
 23716                   goto XI_OTHER;
 23717                 }
 23718 #endif
 23719 #elif USE_GTK
 23720               if ((x_gtk_use_native_input
 23721                    || dpyinfo->prefer_native_input)
 23722                   && xg_filter_key (any, event))
 23723                 {
 23724                   /* Try to attribute core key events from the input
 23725                      method to the input extension event that caused
 23726                      them.  */
 23727                   dpyinfo->pending_keystroke_time = xev->time;
 23728                   dpyinfo->pending_keystroke_source = xev->sourceid;
 23729 
 23730                   *finish = X_EVENT_DROP;
 23731                   goto XI_OTHER;
 23732                 }
 23733 #endif
 23734 
 23735               state |= x_emacs_to_x_modifiers (dpyinfo, extra_keyboard_modifiers);
 23736 
 23737 #ifdef HAVE_XKB
 23738               if (dpyinfo->xkb_desc)
 23739                 {
 23740                   unsigned int xkb_state;
 23741 
 23742                   xkb_state = state & ~(1 << 13 | 1 << 14);
 23743                   xkb_state |= xev->group.effective << 13;
 23744 
 23745                   if (!XkbTranslateKeyCode (dpyinfo->xkb_desc, keycode,
 23746                                             xkb_state, &mods_rtrn, &keysym))
 23747                     goto XI_OTHER;
 23748                 }
 23749               else
 23750                 {
 23751 #endif
 23752                   int keysyms_per_keycode_return;
 23753                   KeySym *ksms = XGetKeyboardMapping (dpyinfo->display, keycode, 1,
 23754                                                       &keysyms_per_keycode_return);
 23755                   if (!(keysym = ksms[0]))
 23756                     {
 23757                       XFree (ksms);
 23758                       goto XI_OTHER;
 23759                     }
 23760                   XFree (ksms);
 23761 #ifdef HAVE_XKB
 23762                 }
 23763 #endif
 23764 
 23765               if (keysym == NoSymbol)
 23766                 goto XI_OTHER;
 23767 
 23768               /* If mouse-highlight is an integer, input clears out
 23769                  mouse highlighting.  */
 23770               if (!hlinfo->mouse_face_hidden && FIXNUMP (Vmouse_highlight)
 23771                   && (f == 0
 23772 #if ! defined (USE_GTK)
 23773                       || !EQ (f->tool_bar_window, hlinfo->mouse_face_window)
 23774 #endif
 23775                       || !EQ (f->tab_bar_window, hlinfo->mouse_face_window))
 23776                   )
 23777                 {
 23778                   mouse_frame = hlinfo->mouse_face_mouse_frame;
 23779 
 23780                   clear_mouse_face (hlinfo);
 23781                   hlinfo->mouse_face_hidden = true;
 23782 
 23783                   if (mouse_frame)
 23784                     x_flush_dirty_back_buffer_on (mouse_frame);
 23785                 }
 23786 
 23787               if (f != 0)
 23788                 {
 23789 #ifdef USE_GTK
